862100.name: Fantasy Grounds - Battlefield Events (5E)
862100.description:
Battlefield Events

Every fight is different, whether that be due to the participants, the weapons, the location, or even the weather. A sudden gust of wind or ground tremor, a wandering monster attracted by the commotion, or even a previously undiscovered trap - all these can swing an encounter. Fate and fortune, after all, are as much part of the battle as are skill and planning.
This product introduces battlefield events - random events which can happen on the battlefield, affecting the combatants or the environment. Battlefield events add an additional element of randomness into battle.
This product includes:
  • 19 battlefield events
  • 6 battlefield fumbles
By Russ Morrissey
Conversion by David Brown
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the Included 5E ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by: David Brown
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and the included 5E Compatible ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
